song.title: Come Holy Spirit, come and set our world
song.lyrics:
[C] Come, Holy Spirit, Come and set our world on fire! Come, Holy Spirit, Come set us ablaze!
[V1] Fill us with your love, renew in us the faith And come, and set our hearts on fire!
[V2] Guide in us the truth, reveal to us the Son, And come, and set our hearts on fire!
[V3] Fill us with your strength and send us in the world, And come, and set our hearts on fire!
[V4] Power from above, come help us to be free, To tell that Jesus is the Lord!
